name: Matrix Synapse
description: Self-hosted Matrix homeserver for secure, decentralized communication.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  db:
    image: postgres:16-alpine
    container_name: matrix-db
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      - POSTGRES_USER=synapse
      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD={{POSTGRES_PASSWORD}}
      - POSTGRES_DB=synapse
      - POSTGRES_INITDB_ARGS=--encoding=UTF-8 --lc-collate=C --lc-ctype=C
    volumes:
      - {{DB_PATH}}:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=matrix-synapse"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=communication"

  synapse:
    image: matrixdotorg/synapse:latest
    container_name: matrix-synapse
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "{{PORT}}:8008"
    volumes:
      - {{DATA_PATH}}:/data
    environment:
      - SYNAPSE_SERVER_NAME={{SERVER_NAME}}
      - SYNAPSE_REPORT_STATS=no
    depends_on:
      - db
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=matrix-synapse"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=communication"

notes: Use Element web client to connect
Server name should be your domain
Consider using reverse proxy with SSL
